Class MarkerElement

java.lang.Object
  |

              |
              +--com.esri.mo2.map.elt.MarkerElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Data, Element, Identifiable, MapData, Spatial
public class MarkerElement
extends GraphicElement

A MarkerElement is a GraphicElement containing a point feature geometry.

See Also:
SimpleMarkerSymbol

draw

public void draw(Graphics2D g,

Description copied from interface: Element
Prints this element using the bounding box info and graphics handle from a printer. The default implementation of this method is empty. Most of the time, developers must override this method to provide real printing capability for the new element type.
